text:
e="preserve">Frances Hesselbein (born 1 November 1915) is an American businesswoman. She served as the CEO of the Girl Scouts of the USA from 1976 to 1990. In 1998, she was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom for her work with the Girl Scouts of the USA.
Hesselbein was born in Johnstown, Pennsylvania. She turned 100 in 2015.
